main_text:
The Method and Philosophy of Jayarāśi
2. The Method and Philosophy of Jayarāśi

Jayarāśi can be classified as a sceptic  only in a
qualified sense (‘qualified sceptic’), namely as a kind of
methodological sceptic, who consistently avails himself of a
particular method to analyse theories and the contents of
propositions, but at the same time retains a set of positive
beliefs.
section_title: 2. The Method and Philosophy of Jayarāśi
